description_txt: stated on September 30, 2015 in an interview on Fox News' "Hannity":
quote_txt: Planned Parenthood "is an organization that funnels millions of dollars in political contributions to pro-abortion candidates."

description_txt: stated on September 25, 2015 in a campaign flier.:
quote_txt: Glen Sturtevant is "against smaller class sizes."

description_txt: stated on October 1, 2015 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Number of Americans killed by terrorism in the last decade: 24. Number of Americans killed by guns in the last decade: 280,024.

description_txt: stated on October 2, 2015 in a broadcast of MSNBC's "Morning Joe":
quote_txt: About "3 percent of murders and crimes are committed with guns from people who actually (legally) purchase those guns."

description_txt: stated on September 12, 2015 in the Republican weekly radio/TV address:
quote_txt: Iran’s "regime is responsible for more than 1,000 American casualties during the Iraq war" and "has plotted a terrorist attack here in our nation's capital."

description_txt: stated on September 8, 2015 in radio interview.:
quote_txt: "It's estimated we leave somewhere north of $350 billion a year - that's billion - a year on the table uncollected because IRS doesn't have the resources."

description_txt: stated on October 4, 2015 in an interview on ABC "This Week":
quote_txt: Among Syrian refugees, "there aren't that many women, there aren't that many children."

description_txt: stated on October 4, 2015 in an interview on "State of the Union":
quote_txt: "We sell 40 percent of our guns without a background check."

description_txt: stated on September 20, 2015 in blog:
quote_txt: "Remember that developers are forced to use the ‘195 land union’ contractors, so tap an extra $10 million into any construction project."

description_txt: stated on September 14, 2015:
quote_txt: Says Missouri Democratic Senate candidate Jason Kander is "attending fancy dinners all over the country."

description_txt: stated on September 8, 2015 in an Austin City Council meeting about the city budget:
quote_txt: "HIV/AIDS among women is skyrocketing in Austin."

description_txt: stated on September 25, 2015 in an interview:
quote_txt: Says Scott Walker "said he wouldn't touch" the state civil service system but now supports overhauling it.

description_txt: stated on September 30, 2015 in a campaign Tweet:
quote_txt: The Benghazi probe is "the longest-running congressional investigation ever."

description_txt: stated on September 29, 2015 in his energy plan:
quote_txt: "Since 2008, U.S. crude oil output has increased by over 80 percent, an increase of over 4 million barrels a day. That is the fastest increase in U.S. history."

description_txt: stated on August 15, 2015 in a radio interview:
quote_txt: Israel has seen a "90 percent reduction in terrorist attacks" that it attributes to building a 500-mile fence.

description_txt: stated on September 10, 2015 in a speech in Georgetown, Texas:
quote_txt: "We have 650 people who move to Texas every day."

description_txt: stated on June 20, 2015 in a post shared on Facebook:
quote_txt: Says after leaving the White House, Hillary Clinton "was forced to return an estimated $200,000 in White House china, furniture and artwork that she had stolen."

description_txt: stated on September 29, 2015 in a Congressional hearing.:
quote_txt: In 2006, Planned Parenthood performed more prevention services and cancer screenings than abortions, but in 2013, there were more abortions.

description_txt: stated on September 27, 2015 in in an article:
quote_txt: Alabama’s Crimson Tide will be the underdog in Saturday’s game against the Georgia Bulldogs, the first time in 72 consecutive games that Alabama has not been favored by oddsmakers to win.

description_txt: stated on September 25, 2015 in Values Voter Summit:
quote_txt: When ICE releases illegal immigrants, "a lot of those people are not from Honduras and Mexico. They’re from Iraq and Somalia and Russia."

description_txt: stated on September 26, 2015 in a speech:
quote_txt: Student loans from the federal government issued between 2007 and 2012 are on target "to produce $66 billion in profits for the United States government."

description_txt: stated on September 28, 2015 in comments on Twitter.:
quote_txt: "Unlike virtually every other campaign, we don't have a super PAC."

description_txt: stated on September 25, 2015 in a viral Internet post:
quote_txt: Honduras "bans citizens from owning guns" and has the "highest homicide rate in the entire world." Switzerland, with a similar population, "requires citizens to own guns" and has the "lowest homicide rate in the entire world."

description_txt: stated on September 28, 2015 in a press conference:
quote_txt: The unemployment rate may be as high as "42 percent."

description_txt: stated on September 22, 2015 in a speech:
quote_txt: Every general City of Milwaukee employee "pays toward his or her pension, but approximately 88 percent of our police officers and firefighters do not."

description_txt: stated on September 27, 2015 in a broadcast of NBC's "Meet the Press":
quote_txt: Says "Bernie Sanders was there when it came to (same-sex) marriage 20 years ago. ... He was there when it wasn't popular."

description_txt: stated on September 27, 2015 in an interview on CBS' "Face the Nation":
quote_txt: "When I left Washington, we had a $5 trillion surplus."

description_txt: stated on September 27, 2015 in an interview on Fox News Sunday:
quote_txt: "There’s no money" for Planned Parenthood in the bill that would keep the government open.

description_txt: stated on August 20, 2015 in comments at the Missouri State Fair:
quote_txt: "Almost nine out of every 10 pennies that would be spent" turning a 200-mile stretch of Interstate 70 into a toll road "would be from folks outside Missouri."

description_txt: stated on September 22, 2015 in a tweet:
quote_txt: The largest low-wage employer "is not McDonalds or Walmart but the U.S. government."
